pages.description:
You spot a lone wolf stalking you, not too far away.

A deep growl suggests hostility.

choices.description: Throw down some food and run
I used to be a blackbelt

pages.description: The shot lands and kills the creature. Your marksmanship is remarkable.

With the food on the ground, looks like it has no intention of chasing you.



 -3 food

As you approach the creature, it runs off into the distance. Perhaps you were intimidating... or it went to gather it's pack.



A howl screeches in the distance...
